scripts.test-coveralls: npm run istanbul && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test-beefy-live: npm run build && beefy es5-generated/test/beefy.js --cwd test -v --live
scripts.coverage: rm -rf coverage && npm run istanbul && istanbul report html && serve coverage
scripts.istanbul: npm run build && istanbul cover es5-generated/test/test.js
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build: rm -rf es5-generated && mkdir es5-generated && babel src-es6 --out-dir es5-generated
scripts.build-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run build-dist-browserify && npm run build-dist-rollup && npm run build-dist-min
scripts.build-dist-browserify: npm run build && browserify --standalone Staffelei  es5-generated/node-wrapper.js -o dist/staffelei-browserify-v${npm_package_version}.js
scripts.build-dist-min: npm run build-dist-rollup-min && npm run build-dist-browserify-min
